query: SELECT id, sku, name, cost, unitPrice, listPrice, retail, replCost, avgCost, price1, price2, price3 FROM parts WHERE sku = 'DL3614' AND lineCodeId = (SELECT id FROM line_codes WHERE code = 'XTD');
